elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: There are six key basic terms that are of central importance in project management and form the basis for the successful planning, implementation and monitoring of projects. Describe the following terms.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Project
elements.correctAnswer: A project is a time-limited undertaking that is carried out in order to achieve a specific goal. Projects are unique and have clear start and end points. They are usually organized in phases and require resources such as time, money, personnel and materials.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Project objective
elements.correctAnswer: The project objective is the desired result or end state that a project should achieve. It should be specific, measurable, accepted, realistic and time-bound (SMART criteria).

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Project plan
elements.correctAnswer: A project plan is a structured document that defines the planned activities, resources, schedules and responsibilities for a project. It serves as a guideline for controlling and monitoring the project.

elements.name: panel1
elements.title: There are six key basic terms that are of central importance in project management and form the basis for the successful planning, implementation and monitoring of projects. Describe the following terms.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Risk management
elements.correctAnswer: Risk management deals with the identification, assessment and management of risks that could jeopardize the successful implementation of a project. The aim is to minimize or control risks.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Stakeholders
elements.correctAnswer: Stakeholders are people, groups or organizations that are directly or indirectly affected by a project or have an influence on it. They may have interests, expectations and concerns that need to be taken into account.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Milestone
elements.correctAnswer: A milestone is an important point in time or a significant achievement in the course of a project. Milestones are used to monitor progress and ensure that the project stays on schedule.
